1.6.name: wordpress/widgetized-admin-dashboard
1.6.description:
Add/Edit/Remove Admin Widgets Yep, straight from the Design > Widgets area - just like you do with your sidebar widgets!

FAQ, Support, Screenshots, Help These can all be found at the plugin's page at Pressography: http://pressography.com/plugins/widgetized-admin-dashboard/

Subscribe To keep track of new updates to this and all of Pressography's plugins, subscribe to Pressography's RSS feed
